title: Newton's Method With $$n=2$$
text: To find $$x_2$$, use the equation $$x_n=x_n-1-\frac{f{\left(x_n-1\right)}}{\operatorname{f'}\left(x_n-1\right)}$$ with $$n=2$$ and the value of $$x_1$$ stored on the calculator.

title: Recall the Derivative of f(x)
text: The derivative of f(x) would be needed to find $$x_2$$ using Newton's method.
